num0: Rich nations owe reparations to countries facing climate disaster, says Pakistan minister
num1: Pakistan's foreign minister Shah Mahmood Qureshi has called for rich nations to pay reparations to countries facing climate disaster, saying the world's poorest countries are the most vulnerable to the effects of global warming.
num2: Qureshi made the comments at the United Nations climate change conference in Madrid, where he said Pakistan was facing a climate emergency.
num3: He said the country was already experiencing the effects of climate change, with the frequency of extreme weather events increasing.
num4: We are facing a climate emergency. We are already experiencing the effects of climate change. The frequency of extreme weather events is increasing," he said.
